III.i.1.B.5.b
.
When Service Departments Provide VA With a Certificate of Release
Service departments provide VA with a copy of a service member’s
DD Form 214
or other appropriate certificate of release
if/when the service member files a claim for VA benefits at the time of separation, or
when the service member is released from active duty.
Note
:  Prior to the deployment of DoD’s Healthcare Artifacts and Images Management Solution (HAIMS) on January 1, 2014, service departments included a copy of
DD Form 214
with the service treatment records (STRs) they provided to VA.
